volumeInfo.title: Hyrule Historia
volumeInfo.description: A comprehensive guide to the rich history, characters, and lore of the Legend of Zelda series, including exclusive artwork and behind-the-scenes details.

volumeInfo.title: Creating a Champion
volumeInfo.description: Explore the making of The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, with developer interviews, concept art, and in-depth explorations of the game's expansive world.

volumeInfo.title: The Legend of Zelda Encyclopedia
volumeInfo.description: A definitive reference guide to the world of Zelda, covering games, characters, and iconic locations from the series' rich history.

volumeInfo.title: Art & Artifacts
volumeInfo.description: A stunning collection of artwork from across The Legend of Zelda series, showcasing the visual evolution of the franchise.

volumeInfo.title: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - Official Guide
volumeInfo.description: The official strategy guide for Ocarina of Time, packed with tips, tricks, and maps to help you on your adventure.

volumeInfo.title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess Manga Vol. 1
volumeInfo.description: A manga adaptation of the beloved game Twilight Princess, following Link's transformation and battle to save Hyrule.

volumeInfo.title: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword Strategy Guide
volumeInfo.description: An in-depth guide to Skyward Sword, offering walkthroughs, item locations, and tips to master the game.

volumeInfo.title: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask - Official Guide
volumeInfo.description: The official companion to Majora's Mask, featuring strategies to navigate its intricate puzzles and time mechanics.

volumeInfo.title: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
volumeInfo.description: A comic adaptation of A Link to the Past, capturing the heart of Link's heroic journey through Hyrule.

volumeInfo.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Master Edition Guide
volumeInfo.description: A detailed guide to Breath of the Wild, including secrets, collectibles, and tips for every adventurer.
